feed.title: Elk Island (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:21 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 2:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -10.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -12.7°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. A few flurries or periods of freezing rain beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 2:19 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries or periods of freezing rain ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 2:19 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 2:19 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 2:19 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
